title: Golpo Holeo Sotti (1966) Bengali - VCD - No Subs [DDR]
description:
Golpo Holeo Sotti (1966) Bengali - VCD - No Subs [DDR]

Directed by Tapan Sinha
Written by Tapan Sinha
Music by Tappan SInha

CAST:- Bhanu Bannerjee, Jogesh Chatterjee, Bharati Devi, Chaya Devi, Ajoy Ganguli, Rabi Ghosh, Rudraprasad Sengupta, Bhanu Bandopadhyay, Bankim Ghosh, Prasad Mukhopadhaya, Chinmoy Roy

Galpa Holeo Satyi (1966) is a comedic Bengali film directed by Tapan Sinha. It stars Bhanu Bannerjee, Jogesh Chatterjee, Bharati Devi, Chaya Devi, Ajoy Ganguli, Rabi Ghosh, Rudraprasad Sengupta. Later the film was remade in Hindi as Bawarchi, starring Rajesh Khanna in the title role.

A new servant comes to a family which is suffering from internal tension within. The new servant, whose identity is itself under suspicion, gradually becomes lovable to all of the family members including the old ailing family head. The story unravels how this new man in their life help each of the family-members find out new meaning to their individual lives as well as find out the happiness of a close-knit family.
